alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Mason; Peoria; Tazewell (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 11:26PM CDT until May 07 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Fulton County in west central Illinois... Central Tazewell County in central Illinois... Northeastern Mason County in central Illinois... Southwestern Peoria County in central Illinois... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1125 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Glasford to near Astoria, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Glasford around 1130 PM CDT. Manito around 1135 PM CDT. Havana and South Pekin around 1145 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Pekin, Green Valley and Tremont. This includes Interstate 155 between mile markers 25 and 31. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Lincoln.
